00056 static struct lu_object *osc2lu(struct osc_object *osc)
00057 {
00058         return &osc->oo_cl.co_lu;
00059 }
00060 
00061 static struct osc_object *lu2osc(const struct lu_object *obj)
00062 {
00063         LINVRNT(osc_is_object(obj));
00064         return container_of0(obj, struct osc_object, oo_cl.co_lu);
00065 }

00068  *
00069  * Object operations.
00070  *
00071  */

00073 static int osc_object_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *obj,
00074                            const struct lu_object_conf *conf)
00075 {
00076         struct osc_object           *osc   = lu2osc(obj);
00077         const struct cl_object_conf *cconf = lu2cl_conf(conf);
00078 
00079         osc->oo_oinfo = cconf->u.coc_oinfo;
00080 #ifdef CONFIG_LUSTRE_DEBUG_EXPENSIVE_CHECK
00081         mutex_init(&osc->oo_debug_mutex);
00082 #endif
00083         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_ready_item);
00084         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_hp_ready_item);
00085         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_write_item);
00086         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_read_item);
00087 
00088         osc->oo_root.rb_node = NULL;
00089         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_hp_exts);
00090         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_urgent_exts);
00091         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_rpc_exts);
00092         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_reading_exts);
00093         atomic_set(&osc->oo_nr_reads, 0);
00094         atomic_set(&osc->oo_nr_writes, 0);
00095         spin_lock_init(&osc->oo_lock);
00096         spin_lock_init(&osc->oo_tree_lock);
00097         spin_lock_init(&osc->oo_ol_spin);
00098         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&osc->oo_ol_list);
00099 
00100         atomic_set(&osc->oo_nr_ios, 0);
00101         init_waitqueue_head(&osc->oo_io_waitq);
00102 
00103         cl_object_page_init(lu2cl(obj), sizeof(struct osc_page));
00104 
00105         return 0;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static void osc_object_free(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *obj)
00109 {
00110         struct osc_object *osc = lu2osc(obj);
00111 
00112         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_ready_item));
00113         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_hp_ready_item));
00114         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_write_item));
00115         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_read_item));
00116 
00117         LASSERT(osc->oo_root.rb_node == NULL);
00118         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_hp_exts));
00119         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_urgent_exts));
00120         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_rpc_exts));
00121         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_reading_exts));
00122         LASSERT(atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_reads) == 0);
00123         LASSERT(atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_writes) == 0);
00124         LASSERT(list_empty(&osc->oo_ol_list));
00125         LASSERT(atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_ios) == 0);
00126 
00127         lu_object_fini(obj);
00128         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(osc, osc_object_kmem);
00129 }

00131 int osc_lvb_print(const struct lu_env *env, void *cookie,
00132                   lu_printer_t p, const struct ost_lvb *lvb)
00133 {
00134         return (*p)(env, cookie, "size: "LPU64" mtime: "LPU64" atime: "LPU64" "
00135                     "ctime: "LPU64" blocks: "LPU64,
00136                     lvb->lvb_size, lvb->lvb_mtime, lvb->lvb_atime,
00137                     lvb->lvb_ctime, lvb->lvb_blocks);
00138 }
00139 
00140 static int osc_object_print(const struct lu_env *env, void *cookie,
00141                             lu_printer_t p, const struct lu_object *obj)
00142 {
00143         struct osc_object   *osc   = lu2osc(obj);
00144         struct lov_oinfo    *oinfo = osc->oo_oinfo;
00145         struct osc_async_rc *ar    = &oinfo->loi_ar;
00146 
00147         (*p)(env, cookie, "id: "DOSTID" "
00148              "idx: %d gen: %d kms_valid: %u kms "LPU64" "
00149              "rc: %d force_sync: %d min_xid: "LPU64" ",
00150              POSTID(&oinfo->loi_oi), oinfo->loi_ost_idx,
00151              oinfo->loi_ost_gen, oinfo->loi_kms_valid, oinfo->loi_kms,
00152              ar->ar_rc, ar->ar_force_sync, ar->ar_min_xid);
00153         osc_lvb_print(env, cookie, p, &oinfo->loi_lvb);
00154         return 0;
00155 }

00158 static int osc_attr_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00159                         struct cl_attr *attr)
00160 {
00161         struct lov_oinfo *oinfo = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00162 
00163         cl_lvb2attr(attr, &oinfo->loi_lvb);
00164         attr->cat_kms = oinfo->loi_kms_valid ? oinfo->loi_kms : 0;
00165         return 0;
00166 }
00167 
00168 static int osc_attr_update(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00169                            const struct cl_attr *attr, unsigned valid)
00170 {
00171         struct lov_oinfo *oinfo = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00172         struct ost_lvb   *lvb   = &oinfo->loi_lvb;
00173 
00174         if (valid & CAT_SIZE)
00175                 lvb->lvb_size = attr->cat_size;
00176         if (valid & CAT_MTIME)
00177                 lvb->lvb_mtime = attr->cat_mtime;
00178         if (valid & CAT_ATIME)
00179                 lvb->lvb_atime = attr->cat_atime;
00180         if (valid & CAT_CTIME)
00181                 lvb->lvb_ctime = attr->cat_ctime;
00182         if (valid & CAT_BLOCKS)
00183                 lvb->lvb_blocks = attr->cat_blocks;
00184         if (valid & CAT_KMS) {
00185                 CDEBUG(D_CACHE, "set kms from "LPU64"to "LPU64"\n",
00186                        oinfo->loi_kms, (__u64)attr->cat_kms);
00187                 loi_kms_set(oinfo, attr->cat_kms);
00188         }
00189         return 0;
00190 }
00191 
00192 static int osc_object_glimpse(const struct lu_env *env,
00193                               const struct cl_object *obj, struct ost_lvb *lvb)
00194 {
00195         struct lov_oinfo *oinfo = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00196 
00197         ENTRY;
00198         lvb->lvb_size   = oinfo->loi_kms;
00199         lvb->lvb_blocks = oinfo->loi_lvb.lvb_blocks;
00200         RETURN(0);
00201 }
00202 
00203 static int osc_object_ast_clear(struct ldlm_lock *lock, void *data)
00204 {
00205         ENTRY;
00206 
00207         if (lock->l_ast_data == data)
00208                 lock->l_ast_data = NULL;
00209         RETURN(LDLM_ITER_CONTINUE);
00210 }
00211 
00212 static int osc_object_prune(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj)
00213 {
00214         struct osc_object       *osc = cl2osc(obj);
00215         struct ldlm_res_id      *resname = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_resname;
00216 
00217         /* DLM locks don't hold a reference of osc_object so we have to
00218          * clear it before the object is being destroyed. */
00219         ostid_build_res_name(&osc->oo_oinfo->loi_oi, resname);
00220         ldlm_resource_iterate(osc_export(osc)->exp_obd->obd_namespace, resname,
00221                               osc_object_ast_clear, osc);
00222         return 0;
00223 }
00224 
00225 static int osc_object_fiemap(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00226                              struct ll_fiemap_info_key *fmkey,
00227                              struct fiemap *fiemap, size_t *buflen)
00228 {
00229         struct obd_export *exp = osc_export(cl2osc(obj));
00230         struct ldlm_res_id resid;
00231         union ldlm_policy_data policy;
00232         struct lustre_handle lockh;
00233         enum ldlm_mode mode = LCK_MINMODE;
00234         struct ptlrpc_request *req;
00235         struct fiemap *reply;
00236         char *tmp;
00237         int rc;
00238         ENTRY;
00239 
00240         fmkey->lfik_oa.o_oi = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo->loi_oi;
00241         if (!(fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_flags & FIEMAP_FLAG_SYNC))
00242                 goto skip_locking;
00243 
00244         policy.l_extent.start = fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_start & PAGE_CACHE_MASK;
00245 
00246         if (OBD_OBJECT_EOF - fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_length <=
00247             fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_start + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1)
00248                 policy.l_extent.end = OBD_OBJECT_EOF;
00249         else
00250                 policy.l_extent.end = (fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_start +
00251                                        fmkey->lfik_fiemap.fm_length +
00252                                        PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) & PAGE_CACHE_MASK;
00253 
00254         ostid_build_res_name(&fmkey->lfik_oa.o_oi, &resid);
00255         mode = ldlm_lock_match(exp->exp_obd->obd_namespace,
00256                                LDLM_FL_BLOCK_GRANTED | LDLM_FL_LVB_READY,
00257                                &resid, LDLM_EXTENT, &policy,
00258                                LCK_PR | LCK_PW, &lockh, 0);
00259         if (mode) { /* lock is cached on client */
00260                 if (mode != LCK_PR) {
00261                         ldlm_lock_addref(&lockh, LCK_PR);
00262                         ldlm_lock_decref(&lockh, LCK_PW);
00263                 }
00264         } else { /* no cached lock, needs acquire lock on server side */
00265                 fmkey->lfik_oa.o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLFLAGS;
00266                 fmkey->lfik_oa.o_flags |= OBD_FL_SRVLOCK;
00267         }
00268 
00269 skip_locking:
00270         req = ptlrpc_request_alloc(class_exp2cliimp(exp),
00271                                    &RQF_OST_GET_INFO_FIEMAP);
00272         if (req == NULL)
00273                 GOTO(drop_lock, rc = -ENOMEM);
00274 
00275         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_KEY, RCL_CLIENT,
00276                              sizeof(*fmkey));
00277         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL, RCL_CLIENT,
00278                              *buflen);
00279         req_capsule_set_size(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL, RCL_SERVER,
00280                              *buflen);
00281 
00282         rc = ptlrpc_request_pack(req, LUSTRE_OST_VERSION, OST_GET_INFO);
00283         if (rc != 0) {
00284                 ptlrpc_request_free(req);
00285                 GOTO(drop_lock, rc);
00286         }
00287         tmp = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_KEY);
00288         memcpy(tmp, fmkey, sizeof(*fmkey));
00289         tmp = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL);
00290         memcpy(tmp, fiemap, *buflen);
00291         ptlrpc_request_set_replen(req);
00292 
00293         rc = ptlrpc_queue_wait(req);
00294         if (rc != 0)
00295                 GOTO(fini_req, rc);
00296 
00297         reply = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_FIEMAP_VAL);
00298         if (reply == NULL)
00299                 GOTO(fini_req, rc = -EPROTO);
00300 
00301         memcpy(fiemap, reply, *buflen);
00302 fini_req:
00303         ptlrpc_req_finished(req);
00304 drop_lock:
00305         if (mode)
00306                 ldlm_lock_decref(&lockh, LCK_PR);
00307         RETURN(rc);
00308 }
00309 
00310 void osc_object_set_contended(struct osc_object *obj)
00311 {
00312         obj->oo_contention_time = cfs_time_current();
00313         /* mb(); */
00314         obj->oo_contended = 1;
00315 }
00316 
00317 void osc_object_clear_contended(struct osc_object *obj)
00318 {
00319         obj->oo_contended = 0;
00320 }
00321 
00322 int osc_object_is_contended(struct osc_object *obj)
00323 {
00324         struct osc_device *dev  = lu2osc_dev(obj->oo_cl.co_lu.lo_dev);
00325         int osc_contention_time = dev->od_contention_time;
00326         cfs_time_t cur_time     = cfs_time_current();
00327         cfs_time_t retry_time;
00328 
00329         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_OSC_OBJECT_CONTENTION))
00330                 return 1;
00331 
00332         if (!obj->oo_contended)
00333                 return 0;
00334 
00335         /*
00336          * I like copy-paste. the code is copied from
00337          * ll_file_is_contended.
00338          */
00339         retry_time = cfs_time_add(obj->oo_contention_time,
00340                                   cfs_time_seconds(osc_contention_time));
00341         if (cfs_time_after(cur_time, retry_time)) {
00342                 osc_object_clear_contended(obj);
00343                 return 0;
00344         }
00345         return 1;
00346 }
00347 
00353 static void osc_req_attr_set(const struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj,
00354                              struct cl_req_attr *attr)
00355 {
00356         struct lov_oinfo *oinfo;
00357         struct obdo      *oa;
00358         struct ost_lvb   *lvb;
00359         u64               flags = attr->cra_flags;
00360 
00361         oinfo   = cl2osc(obj)->oo_oinfo;
00362         lvb     = &oinfo->loi_lvb;
00363         oa      = attr->cra_oa;
00364 
00365         if ((flags & OBD_MD_FLMTIME) != 0) {
00366                 oa->o_mtime = lvb->lvb_mtime;
00367                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLMTIME;
00368         }
00369         if ((flags & OBD_MD_FLATIME) != 0) {
00370                 oa->o_atime = lvb->lvb_atime;
00371                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLATIME;
00372         }
00373         if ((flags & OBD_MD_FLCTIME) != 0) {
00374                 oa->o_ctime = lvb->lvb_ctime;
00375                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCTIME;
00376         }
00377         if (flags & OBD_MD_FLGROUP) {
00378                 ostid_set_seq(&oa->o_oi, ostid_seq(&oinfo->loi_oi));
00379                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLGROUP;
00380         }
00381         if (flags & OBD_MD_FLID) {
00382                 ostid_set_id(&oa->o_oi, ostid_id(&oinfo->loi_oi));
00383                 oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00384         }
00385         if (flags & OBD_MD_FLHANDLE) {
00386                 struct ldlm_lock *lock;
00387                 struct osc_page *opg;
00388 
00389                 opg = osc_cl_page_osc(attr->cra_page, cl2osc(obj));
00390                 lock = osc_dlmlock_at_pgoff(env, cl2osc(obj), osc_index(opg),
00391                                 OSC_DAP_FL_TEST_LOCK | OSC_DAP_FL_CANCELING);
00392                 if (lock == NULL && !opg->ops_srvlock) {
00393                         struct ldlm_resource *res;
00394                         struct ldlm_res_id *resname;
00395 
00396                         CL_PAGE_DEBUG(D_ERROR, env, attr->cra_page,
00397                                       "uncovered page!\n");
00398 
00399                         resname = &osc_env_info(env)->oti_resname;
00400                         ostid_build_res_name(&oinfo->loi_oi, resname);
00401                         res = ldlm_resource_get(
00402                                 osc_export(cl2osc(obj))->exp_obd->obd_namespace,
00403                                 NULL, resname, LDLM_EXTENT, 0);
00404                         ldlm_resource_dump(D_ERROR, res);
00405 
00406                         libcfs_debug_dumpstack(NULL);
00407                         LBUG();
00408                 }
00409 
00410                 /* check for lockless io. */
00411                 if (lock != NULL) {
00412                         oa->o_handle = lock->l_remote_handle;
00413                         oa->o_valid |= OBD_MD_FLHANDLE;
00414                         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00415                 }
00416         }
00417 }
00418 
00419 static const struct cl_object_operations osc_ops = {
00420         .coo_page_init    = osc_page_init,
00421         .coo_lock_init    = osc_lock_init,
00422         .coo_io_init      = osc_io_init,
00423         .coo_attr_get     = osc_attr_get,
00424         .coo_attr_update  = osc_attr_update,
00425         .coo_glimpse      = osc_object_glimpse,
00426         .coo_prune        = osc_object_prune,
00427         .coo_fiemap       = osc_object_fiemap,
00428         .coo_req_attr_set = osc_req_attr_set
00429 };
00430 
00431 static const struct lu_object_operations osc_lu_obj_ops = {
00432         .loo_object_init      = osc_object_init,
00433         .loo_object_release   = NULL,
00434         .loo_object_free      = osc_object_free,
00435         .loo_object_print     = osc_object_print,
00436         .loo_object_invariant = NULL
00437 };
00438 
00439 struct lu_object *osc_object_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00440                                    const struct lu_object_header *unused,
00441                                    struct lu_device *dev)
00442 {
00443         struct osc_object *osc;
00444         struct lu_object  *obj;
00445 
00446         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(osc, osc_object_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00447         if (osc != NULL) {
00448                 obj = osc2lu(osc);
00449                 lu_object_init(obj, NULL, dev);
00450                 osc->oo_cl.co_ops = &osc_ops;
00451                 obj->lo_ops = &osc_lu_obj_ops;
00452         } else
00453                 obj = NULL;
00454         return obj;
00455 }
00456 
00457 int osc_object_invalidate(const struct lu_env *env, struct osc_object *osc)
00458 {
00459         struct l_wait_info lwi = { 0 };
00460         ENTRY;
00461 
00462         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Invalidate osc object: %p, # of active IOs: %d\n",
00463                osc, atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_ios));
00464 
00465         l_wait_event(osc->oo_io_waitq, atomic_read(&osc->oo_nr_ios) == 0, &lwi);
00466 
00467         /* Discard all dirty pages of this object. */
00468         osc_cache_truncate_start(env, osc, 0, NULL);
00469 
00470         /* Discard all caching pages */
00471         osc_lock_discard_pages(env, osc, 0, CL_PAGE_EOF, CLM_WRITE);
00472 
00473         /* Clear ast data of dlm lock. Do this after discarding all pages */
00474         osc_object_prune(env, osc2cl(osc));
00475 
00476         RETURN(0);
00477 }
